ComicInfo.Title: Star People and Creatures and Things Weekly; Cracked Interviews the Hobo King; The 99,999 Mile Book; The Cracked World of Toys and Games; One Minute TV Shows of the Future; The How to Insult Manual; A Brochure from P.T.U. (Prime Time University); A Souvenir Photo Album of Their Visit to Earth; The Machine Mania Monopolozes the Movies; The Spy Who Snubbed Me
ComicInfo.Summary:
Parody magazines for extraterrestrials.
A brochure from a university where students study television.
The robots Cy-Threepiu and Arty-Ditto visit Earth.
Advertisements for movies of all genres starring robots in the cast.
